title: Retrieve Account Tags
description:
This API retrieves account tags.

As a user of Kill Bill API, I should be able to retrieve account tags based on the following acceptance criteria:

Acceptance Criteria:

HTTP Request:

GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags

Path Parameters:

accountId (string, required): The ID of the account to retrieve tags for.  Pattern: `\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+`, Format: `uuid`

Query Parameters:

includedDeleted (boolean, optional): Whether to include deleted tags. Default: `false`
audit (string, optional):  Audit level. Enum: `FULL`, `MINIMAL`, `NONE`. Default: `NONE`

Response:

Success Scenario:

Status Code: 200 OK
Response Body: An array of Tag objects representing the account's tags.

Error Scenarios:

Status Code: 400 Bad Request: Invalid account id supplied
Status Code: 404 Not Found: Account not found

title: Add Tags to Account
description:
This API adds tags to an account.

As a user of Kill Bill API, I should be able to add tags to an account based on the following acceptance criteria:

Acceptance Criteria:

HTTP Request:

POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags

Path Parameters:

accountId (string, required): The ID of the account to add tags to. Pattern: `\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+`, Format: `uuid`

Request Body:

An array of tagDefinitionIds (string, UUID) to add to the account.

Header Parameters:

X-Killbill-CreatedBy (string, required):  Who is performing the operation.
X-Killbill-Reason (string, optional): Reason for performing the operation.
X-Killbill-Comment (string, optional): Comment for performing the operation.

Response:

Success Scenario:

Status Code: 201 Created
Response Body: An array of Tag objects representing the newly created tags.

Error Scenario:

Status Code: 400 Bad Request: Invalid account id supplied

accountId (string, required): The ID of the account to remove tags from. Pattern: `\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+-\w+`, Format: `uuid`

Header Parameters:

X-Killbill-CreatedBy (string, required): Who is performing the operation.
X-Killbill-Reason (string, optional): Reason for performing the operation.
X-Killbill-Comment (string, optional): Comment for performing the operation.

Response:

Success Scenario:

Error Scenario:

Status Code: 400 Bad Request: Invalid account id supplied or account does not have a default payment method (AUTO_PAY_OFF tag only)

Response Body: A Payment object representing the created payment transaction.

Status Code: 400 Bad Request: Invalid account id supplied
